entries.title: Tesla launches official Steam integration
entries.description: The full Steam store is available on new Model S and X cars with 16GB RAM.

entries.title: Why do relaxing farming life sims stress me out so much?
entries.description: They're meant to be cozy, casual, and stress-free. So why do I wind up rage-quitting them so often?

entries.title: Future Dwarf Fortress 'creative mode' will let you sculpt whole worlds, dream up homemade gods
entries.description: A long-planned magic system is "like payoff for all the work we've been doing," says Dwarf Fortress's Tarn Adams.

entries.title: Starfield's faction quests will play more like Skyrim than Fallout 4
entries.description: Lead quest designer Will Shen said players will be able to play all the faction quests independently—but won't necessarily be able to become their leader.

entries.title: You can now pet Geralt's horse in The Witcher 3, and it's about time
entries.description: CD Projekt confirmed that the ability to pet Roach is an official, surprise addition in today's free next-gen update.

entries.title: Epic is delisting almost every Unreal game, but making Unreal Tournament 3 free
entries.description: Epic is moving to exclusive support of its online services suite, and that means older games are gone.

entries.title: Critical Role's Matt Mercer will voice Minsc in Baldur's Gate 3
entries.description: Today's big Baldur's Gate 3 update adds the paladin class, increases the level cap, and adds a "reaction system." And you can fly!

entries.title: 2K's launcher seems to negatively impact Midnight Suns' performance, but you can turn it off
entries.description: Failure to launch.

entries.title: Destiny 2 Dawning ingredients: How to bake cookies and farm essence
entries.description: Bake Christmas cookies for hungry hungry Guardians.

entries.title: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader is shaping up to be a stellar CRPG
entries.description: Owlcat Games' latest has shot to the top of my most-wanted list.

entries.title: Halo Infinite's terrible, horrible, no good, very bad year
entries.description: Halo Infinite missed its moment. Can it claw its way back?

entries.title: The Witcher 3's free next-gen update is out now, but some players report performance issues
entries.description: While some are enjoying the update, others have to roll back to an older patch.

entries.title: Overwatch 2's Winter Wonderland event is back and actually has an earnable skin this time
entries.description: Just the one, but it's better than Halloween Terror.

entries.title: One of the last EVGA GPUs to ever be made is currently going for $9,500 at a charity auction
entries.description: Have we got $10,000 in the room?

entries.title: How to craft a feather cape in Valheim
entries.description: This new armor piece stops you from taking fall damage.

entries.title: Fortnite Winterfest 2022: Presents, free skins, and snowballs
entries.description: Unwrap presents for free stuff during Winterfest.

entries.title: World of Warcraft: Dragonflight Season 1 kicks off with a new raid, arena and lots of proto-drakes that need killing
entries.description: There's a lot more to do in the Dragon Isles.

entries.title: Oops, the Crisis Core remaster forgot about this watermarked stock image
entries.description: Getty Images, the famous Final Fantasy 7 character.

entries.title: How to enable cross-platform progression for The Witcher 3: Complete Edition
entries.description: You don't have to start all over again if you don't want to.

entries.title: This nuclear fusion breakthrough is giving us major Fallout vibes, in a good way
entries.description: Non-destructive nuclear fusion is possible, and man does it slap.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 543 answer and hint for Wednesday, December 14
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #543 puzzle.

entries.title: PSA: Firaxis put a whole dang Midnight Suns cartoon on YouTube
entries.description: If you can hum the theme of the '90s X-Men cartoon, you need to see this.
